Titles.projects: Projects: Halning projects I worked with and work with

About.name: y name is Andrei Khomenko.
About.loveCode: I like to write code and here is my way.

textMain.0: For advice of my friend and mentor (experienced programmer) I began to learn a web-programming with the help of
textMain.1: and other available on the Internet resources. As I had got first knowledge of programming I began to implement it in my own project. Unfortunately, the project has not been finished.
. Development of parser(scraper) for collection of information from more than 30 web-sites. The scraper was written on Object Oriented PHP with using of pattern designs.
textMain.2: After the successful accomplishing of the task  I worked on a basket from scratch. I used Bootstrap, LESS , Query, Query UI, Pjax, Google API, AJAX and JSON for the —Åommunication with the server. The server-side was written on PHP in conjunction with MySQL.
textMain.3: In the last months I performed many tasks from server-side to layout. Also in free time I have passed CS50 Harvard course -
textMain.4: . In the company our team worked in Scrum. I have a little experience in DevOps and Azure too.

textMain.1: . In this company I worked exactly as a front-end programmer.  My first and main tasks were a layout of project for mobile devices, optimization and extension of functionality, transition on Component-based app architecture. During this project I worked with such technologies as Angular 1.5, Gulp, SASS, Bulma and Bootstrap 3, sometimes jQuery. The work was organized by Scrum. The Git control version.
. I was on the position of the front-end developer. Work with Angular and such technologies
textMain.2: as Angular Material, Angular Cli, Angular Animations, Angular Universal, Webpack. Writing of Unit tests and texts in the context of Angular. Layout, SASS layout. Work in a Scrum team, the project management is caring out by Jira.

textMain.1:
. I work as a Senior Software Engineer. On the current project, I work as a Lead of the FrontEnd stream. 
 My current project related to credit reports. Client from the USA.
textMain.2: In the first project in Epam, I was a member of a big team with 9 JS engineers, 15 Java engineers, and 4 QA. At current my project before reducing cause of COVID I had been working with 3 JS engineers, 10 Java engineers, 2 QA.
textMain.3: I have been working with Angular 2+ since I was hired by EPAM.
